name: Skedaddle Square
description:
This was made for the GeoJam - itch.io


CONTROLS-Swipe


Summary: 

Skedaddle Square is a top-down puzzle game where you have to escape from the evil pink doritos, by getting to the other side.

How to play: 

Drag your finger or mouse across the screen.

How does this fit along with the topic:

This fits with the topic Other Side because you need to escape to the other side of the room.
